choices: Torture(Max and his symbiote tickle her together(full body(any method))
1.content:
As a young version of Max Parker sat down in the lab, he began to type away at the keyboard. He sighed seeing as all of this was so weird...a friend of the older Max, Melody Hamilton sat down in the other chair and studied him. This young Max hadn't begun to grow his beard and was also still in one of the earlier suits...she sighed quietly before slipping out of her shoes and looking at him once more.


"So how did you get here?" The young Max looked at her and he rubbed the back of his head...it was hard to explain.


"It was the Kingpin with some device that can open portals to other dimensions...the...time dilation accelerator. Apparently, it can also travel through time..." As Max explained how he got to her time, Mel sighed before using her feet to remove her socks. Max of course noticed and stopped typing for a moment but quickly continued seeing as it would become quite suspicious if he stopped once she began removing her socks...he could hear her shifting in her seat before hearing two noises. Max looked to his right and saw her feet directly in front of his nose...as he backed off with his chair he cleared his throat before looking at her.


"What? What's wrong?"
1.title: It begins

13.content:
Suddenly Max symbiote formed all over his body and suddenly began to cover both him and Melody. They had both closed their eyes for a moment before finding themselves in a big black orb...Max looked around nervously before he could hear his symbiote in his head.

"I know what you want...and I'll gladly give it to you..." Max cleared his throat and then he could hear Melody struggling against the grip of his symbiote...he looked over to her and suddenly more black tendrils appeared and began to rip off Mel clothes leaving her in her underwear she looked at Max in fear and suddenly she could feel something stroke her feet. She let out a giggle and Max smiled as he kneeled in front of her feet.

"That confirms it...the photographer girl is ticklish..." Said Max symbiote before the black tendrils began to move once more and they positioned themselves around her body. Four next to both sides of her stomach, one hovering over her belly button, another pair of two were hovering in front of her armpits. More formed next to her thighs and another pair next to her feet.

"What's going on? Why are you--" before she could finish the tendrils began to poke and stroke all the spots relentlessly and Max joins in and strokes his fingers over her feet. He explores every possible spot...meanwhile Mel is laughing loudly...she cries out for it to stop but it immediately gets worse. She laughs so hard her entire body is shaking...she wants to hold her sides but she can't...as Max sits there and is exploring her feet his symbiote begins to form around him. "Perhaps we should go look for more people to have fun with..." Max nods but does decide to stay for some more fun...he begins to stroke in a circular motion on her feet and smiles widely...

"Haha! Stahp! Hahahaha! Pleas--hahaha!" She pleads for him to stop but he doesn't want to...but perhaps he should find some more people to...toture.
13.title: Torture(Max and his symbiote tickle her togethe...

info.brief_description: A small interactive story of my two Marvel OCs having fun
info.description:
Rules
-No sex. I won't have that here
-Only the female characters can be tickled(so yes you can bring in other Marvel characters but I'll bring in my own as well)
-No moaning/getting ', wet' or anything else too sexual because in my opinion that defaces the characters' true selves. (The tickling is supposed to be torture for them. The tickler can enjoy it. Not the ticklee. They have to be begging for the tickler to stop. You get what I'm trying to tell you)
-Please use good grammar, I can't stress this enough people.
-One line chapters are lazy and uninteresting, so you should refrain from using those if you can help it. If you can't then don't post until you have a good sized chapter to show you put effort into your writing.
